Performance matters—especially when you’re exploring live data and making decisions in real time. We have released a set of improvements, all aiming to make Real-Time Dashboards faster, smoother, and more responsive, based directly on what our customers and community told us.

We listen to your feedback and take action!

## What’s Improved

Thanks to a series of performance optimizations across the dashboard experience, we’ve achieved a significant double‑digit reduction in full dashboard load time, along with major improvements in common interactions:

- **Much faster initial dashboard load**—in some scenarios, up to **6× faster**
- **Large dataset visualizations load dramatically quicker**, reducing wait time and friction
- **Charts render more efficiently** (including up to **10× faster** pie charts)
- **Smoother, more responsive UI**, with freezes and visual jumps eliminated

These gains add up to a noticeably snappier experience—especially when working with live, high‑volume data.

## Why This Matters

Performance isn’t just about benchmarks—it’s about flow, confidence, and trust. Faster dashboards mean:

- Quicker insights from live data
- Less interruption when exploring or refreshing tiles
- A more polished, reliable experience you can depend on

## Try it Yourself

The best way to feel the difference is to experience it firsthand.

**[Get started with the Real-Time Dashboards quick start](https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/real-time-intelligence/dashboard-real-time-create?tabs=create-manual%2Ckql-database)**

Spin up your first Real-Time Dashboard in minutes and see how fast live data exploration can be.

As always, keep the feedback coming—we’re listening.
